@Dstseven and baseball

I never had to type X's or 1's. Whenever I start RS, it asks me to register, I simply click "Register Later" or the red X on the top right hand corner of the box to close out.

I DLed snodrog's RS APPLICATION, opened the APPLICATION, applied the patch and THEN and ONLY THEN did I bother with the language packs. 

Step 1: Download RS Application
Step 2: Apply the patch after installing the Application (Snowdrog has a readme file with instructions)
Step 3: Download language packs
Step 4: Mount 1 language level at a time using DiskUtility (Macs have built in mounting software, you don't need Daemon tools, etc)
Step 5: Open RS, click add language. When asks you to insert disk, hit OK, language level should show up.
Step 6: Repeat step 4 and 5 for all language levels. 

Voila!

You must apply the patch/ crack (.dat file) before attempting.

Also make sure the internet is turned off once you've DLed everything.

ANNNND never activate!

Enjoy!

CORRECTION!!!!!

I DLed ANONYMOUS' RS Application, not Snodrog's.

Link Here:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5181175/Rosetta_Stone_Application_V3.4.5_for_Mac_OS_X

Instructions/ readme file attached. :)
